text:
View this post on Instagram
One of the most special things that our relationship has given us is a merging of families who love and respect each other's faiths and cultures. And so planning our wedding with an amalgamation of both was so so amazing. An important part of the pre wedding rituals for the girl in an Indian wedding is the Mehendi. Once again we made it our own and it was an afternoon that kicked off the celebrations in the way we both dreamed. @nickjonas
A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Dec 1, 2018 at 7:31am PST
title: PC Literally Dancing On Nick Jonas' Tunes For Their Pre-Wedding Shoot Is A Sight For Sore Eyes!
description: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas also did a pre-wedding shoot with Vogue. The couple is the first one to be on the Vogue’s digital cover.Love is in the air – quite literally in the B-town at least! On one hand, it was Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s wedding reception bash yesterday attended by all big stars of Bollywood, and on the other, Priyanka Chopra got married in Christian ceremony yester
